name: Overture Consulting, LLC
description:
Overture Consulting is aÂ boutique technology advisory, IT consulting and systems integration services company headquartered in Denison, TX. We support our clients by guiding them in the use of information technology (IT) to achieve their business objectives in a more efficient and cost-effective manner.
Overture is especially effective in key areas such as: Enterprise Architecture (EA), IT Strategy, Cloud Computing, Enterprise Virtualization, Enterprise Collaboration and Productivity Tool integration and customization, Business Process Automation (BPA), Business Intelligence (BI), and Cross-Platform Application Development, to name just a few.
It is Overture's vision to provide innovative, best of breed, turnkey solutions for their clients. Overture's world-class consultancy services recognize the importance of collaboration and capitalizing on the benefits of organizational effectiveness using technology while leveraging research partners, industry teaming partners, and strategic alliances; all for the benefit of their clients.
